descriptionBlock.title: What can I expect from the workshop?

partners.name: Ultimate Angular
partners.description: Ultimate Angular: Expert-led online Angular training courses

mentors.name: Siddharth
mentors.bio: Siddharth is a full stack JavaScript Developer, currently focused on developing applications on Angular and Firebase in its various flavors. He works for TATA Consultancy Services as an IT Analyst

mentors.name: Martina
mentors.bio: Martina is a Google Developer Expert in Angular and web technologies. Besides giving workshops as an Angular trainer,she is a core member of the ngGirls Team, and co-organizes the NG-DE conference.

mentors.name: Srashti
mentors.bio: Srashti Jain is a senior developer at Hvantage Technologies. She has hands-on experience of Angular, Microsoft Azure and Power BI.

mentors.name: Gaurav
mentors.bio: Gaurav is an Independent Software Consultant from India. He is Co-Founder Indore Technical Community, a local community group which organizes technology sessions, seminars and events for professionals and students. He is also a volunteer @TheYouthProject.in, an online learning initiative to help students get access to professional mentoring and instructor led online coaching to master various technologies.

mentors.name: And You?
mentors.bio: Become a mentor and support the participants at our workshop. Just fill out this form.
